definitions.definition: A bound morpheme added to a word’s stem , such as a prefix or suffix .
That which is affixed; an appendage .
The complex number a + b i {\displaystyle a+bi} associated with the point in the Gauss plane with coordinates ( a , b ) {\displaystyle (a,b)} .
Any small feature, as a figure, a flower, or the like, added for ornament to a vessel or other utensil, to an architectural feature.

main_definition: ( linguistic morphology ) A bound morpheme added to a word’s stem , such as a prefix or suffix .
secondary_definitions: ( now uncommon ) That which is affixed; an appendage .
( mathematics ) The complex number a + b i {\displaystyle a+bi} associated with the point in the Gauss plane with coordinates ( a , b ) {\displaystyle (a,b)} .
( decorative art ) Any small feature, as a figure, a flower, or the like, added for ornament to a vessel or other utensil, to an architectural feature.
